text: chı wa xallxh ca thrng thxdthing brrda phu sraththa wi nı sphaph thi phwk cea kalang pen xyu k hami cnkwa phraxngkh ca thrng canæk phu thi lew xxk cak phu thi di theanan læa chı wa xallxh ca thrng hı phwk cea mxng hen sing renlab k hami tæthwa xallxh nan ca thrng khadleuxk cak brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh dangnan phwk cea cng sraththa tx xal xxh læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh theid læa hak phwk cea sraththa læa yakerng læw sahrab phwk cea k khux rangwal xan ying hıy
